comment._content: Is the picure/postcard partially colorized ? The colors seem a bit strange and only in certain places (the theatre, the name of the café, etc...)

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/cyferus] It is colorized.  I think it was done by hand, or some other process, but not using color film
